bibdata.title: IEEE Std 1636.99-2013, IEEE Standard for Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA): Common Information Elements.
IEEE Std 1636.99-2013, IEEE Standard for Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA): Common Information Elements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is intended to promote and facilitate interoperability between components of SIMICA. The standard defines EXPRESS information models and XML schemas that together define the common information elements supporting these interfaces.

This standard is intended to promote and facilitate interoperability between components of SIMICA. The standard defines EXPRESS information models and XML schemas that together define the common information elements supporting these interfaces.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: Software Interface for Maintenance Information Collection and Analysis (SIMICA)
